=Miscellaneous Commands=

Under this category you find the commands which aren't grouped under any specific category but are still quite used on most scripting tasks.

 * [addvariables addvariables] - adds all variables listed inside a section
 * [beep beep] - uses the system speaker
 * [echo echo] - outputs a message (viewable on the log)
 * [exit exit] - stops processing current script
 * [getparam GetParam] - get the parameters passed to a script section
 * [halt halt] - stops building the whole project
 * [loop Loop] - provides a simple looping construct
 * [message message] - outputs a message window
 * [packparam PackParam] - pack the parameters to be passed to another section
 * [run run / exec] - runs a section from a script file
 * [set set] - changes the value of a variable
 * [shellexecute ShellExecute] - launches an external file
   * [shellexecutedelete ShellExecuteDelete]
   * [shellexecuteex ShellExecuteEx]
 * [system System] - used to refresh values on the program itself
   * [systemComp80 System,Comp80]
   * [systemCursor System,Cursor]
   * [systemErrorOff System,ErrorOff]
   * [systemFileRedirect System,FileRedirect]  ^processed in 64bit systems only^
   * [systemGetEnv System,GetEnv]
   * [systemGetFreeDrive System,GetFreeDrive]
   * [systemGetFreeSpace System,GetFreeSpace]
   * [systemHasUAC System,HasUAC]
   * [systemIsAdmin System,IsAdmin]
   * [systemIsTerminal System,IsTerminal]
   * [systemLog System,Log]
   * [systemOnBuildExit System,OnBuildExit]
   * [systemOnScriptExit System,OnScriptExit]
   * [systemRebuildVars System,RebuildVars]
   * [systemRefreshInterface System,RefreshInterface] 
   * [systemRefreshVars System,RefreshVars] 
   * [systemRegRedirect System,RegRedirect] ^processed in 64bit systems only^
   * [systemReScanScripts System,ReScanScripts]
   * [systemSaveLog System,SaveLog]
   * [systemSplitParameters System,SplitParameters]
 * [wait wait] - "sleeps" the script for specified time
